title: Frozen 2 Trailer: How Do You Solve a Problem Like Elsa?
text:
The trolls from Frozen are back and giving out more vague advice to our heroes in the sequel. Elsa (Idina Menzel), now with far more control over her powers, must journey north across the Enchanted Lands in order to defeat the force threatening her kingdom. The mysterious villain could be anything at this point: the massive rock monster lurking in the background, the magical horse spirit Elsa keeps seeing, or, of course, the creepy fall foliage that just looks … questionable. Whatever it is, it holds the answer as to why Elsa has her gift. She, Anna (Kristen Bell), Kristoff (Jonathan Groff), and that annoying snowman (Josh Gad) just have to survive the journey to find out, and bump into some new characters along the way, voiced by Sterling K. Brown and Evan Rachel Wood. “We always feared Elsa’s powers were too much for this world,” Pabbie the troll warns. “Now we must hope they are enough.” Frozen 2 will arrive in theaters on November 20.

Related
description: Watch the trailer for Disney’s “Frozen 2,” in which Elsa and Anna are sent on a dangerous mission to save the kingdom.
